resources.string: Automatically wake up the device after successful connection
Automatically close the screen of the controlled terminal after a successful connection
Automatically lock the controlled terminal when disconnecting
Automatically restore the backlight of the controlled terminal when it is disconnected (this function can be turned on or off if automatic locking is enabled)
The controlled end is not locked during the connection
Whether to automatically return to the desktop after the default is turned on at startup
Set whether the navigation bar is displayed by default in small window and full screen modes
After this function is enabled, the system enters the full-screen state directly after the connection is successful
Automatically minimized when touching a position outside the small window. The default is unchanged.
When you exit the full screen by non-manual operation, it is automatically minimized, and if you turn off the secondary option, you will automatically switch to a small window.
No operation automatically returns to the original mode within 5 seconds after the automatic suspension is triggered
Automatically reconnect when unexpectedly disconnected (cannot automatically reconnect because the wired device needs to be reauthorized)

* the donation will be entered into the system within 24 hours. Please wait patiently. 
 * easy to control is a buyout system, and there is no limit on the number of devices to be used, but in order to prevent theft, a single account is limited to 5 devices by default 
 * in order to protect your privacy, easy control uses random numbers to identify a device, which means that reinstalled software will also be considered a new device 
 * if you cannot activate or have any other problems due to an excess number of devices, please contact us 
 * contact address: mingzhixian@outlook.com
Input error or system still not entered or more than 5 devices
Activate successfully, please check the instructions before use
Connection failed, please check ADB and network
The full screen status will intercept the return
When turned on, it will attempt to transmit audio, and the controlled end needs to be on Android 12
Sets the maximum size of the screen length and width
Maximum frame rate limit, the lower the value, the more sluggish the picture, but the smaller the traffic, the delay will be reduced
The larger the bit rate, the smaller the video loss, and the larger the video volume. You are advised to set the value to 4. If the bit rate is too high, the delay increases
H265 is preferred, the video size is small and the delay is low. The actual situation is mainly supported. If the video is abnormal, try to close it
After this function is enabled, the resolution of the controlled end will be automatically changed. Therefore, the resolution may not be automatically restored (you can manually restore it)
